events.name: Sixth Annual Tampa Winter Games and NETMF Hackathon
events.about:
Its back again! Come out and get away from line of business and enterprise applications for the day and reignite your passion for programming. Better than ever, well be providing starter kits for game development for Windows 8 and Windows Phone so that you can pick the framework that works best for you, or for an extreme challenge you can hack a circuit board using the .NET framework.

Oh did we mention that the event is on the day of the Mayan Apocalypse? You wont have to worry about your day job after this anyway so you might as well come out and have some fun. Well provide the food, Bill Reiss will be making his famous lasagna for lunch, so even if you cant get out first thing in the morning come out when you can. No matter when you show up, even if its after work, youll have an opportunity to win a prize! Come at lunch, or after work (hopefully work will let out early for you for the Friday before Christmas), or hopefully you can spend the whole day with us.

Please register early (and often) so that we know how much food to make.

events.name: BUILD 2012 Watchfest, Installfest, & Hackathon
events.about:
With Windows Phone 8 releasing, WIndows 8 Releasing, and BUILD finding a decent date that did not conflict with any of these events was difficult. As a result we decided to have a Watchathon/Hackathon/Installfest night. 

Well be watching whatever is happening at BUILD on Tuesday, October 30th, 6pm (our time). Well also have as many of our local experts around as is possible, so if between now and the 30th you run into issues you can not get around bring them. We will  do our best to help. Looking for a good time to install Win8, The 30th is the night.

It will be a fun time (yes, we will have some food, and probably a few prizes).

ALSO, If you are going to BUILD, next month we are planning a BUILD recap event, and we want you to come talk to us. All you need to do is answer the question The thing at BUILD that excited me was ____ (and you fill in the blank).

FINALLY, and most importantly, could you at the very least click on some or all of the following links if you havent yet:

  • http://bit.ly/TCtHWp - 30-Day Windows 8 App Development
  • http://bit.ly/SQinjR - Download Windows Server 2012
  • http://bit.ly/SkInru - Download VS 2012 Express
  • http://bit.ly/NPCUIn - Get 90 days of Azure Free
  • http://bit.ly/Q7McfN - 30-Day Windows Phone App Development
  • http://bit.ly/TCuGWP - Hyper-V Server 2012 (new!)
  • http://bit.ly/P2JAPg - System Center 2012 Suite
  • http://bit.ly/QjPi3S - MS Virtual Academy

events.name: Tampa Startup Weekend
events.about: Startup Weekend Tampa is an intense 54 hour event where a community of entrepreneurs, startup enthusiasts, developers, designers, marketing gurus and anyone interested in building a business come together over the course of a weekend to share ideas, form teams, and launch a startup. No Talk, All Action. Launch a Startup in 54 hours.

events.name: Bill Reiss' Third Annual XNA Game Camp and Hackathon
events.about:
This is a FREE event!

Maybe you have always dreamed of writing games, or youre an aspiring game developer looking to meet up and share ideas and techniques, or you are currently writing games for iOS or Android and want to give Windows Phone and Xbox a shot. This event is for you!

Join Bill Reiss, Silverlight MVP and author of game frameworks and games for Windows Phone and Xbox for a fun day of learning and coding using XNA Game Studio and C#. Well be focusing on Windows Phone, but the same techniques can help you get your game on Xbox Live Independent Games.

Bill and his talented guest presenters will present sessions on XNA game development throughout the day and evening, but the focus is really on jumping in and getting your game on and getting help along the way. Game templates for popular types of games will be provided to get you started.

Well be providing food and caffeinated drinks throughout the day, and well have some great giveaways. Come with a game idea or well be happy to help you come up with one.

Even if you cant come early, come whever you can and join in on the fun!
